summary: A Belgian woman looks back on her year at a Japanese corporation in Tokyo in 1990. She is Amélie, born in Japan, living there until age 5. After college graduation, she returns with a ... See full summary »
cast: Sylvie Testud|Kaori Tsuji|Tarô Suwa|Bison Katayama|Yasunari Kondo|Sôkyû Fujita|Gen Shimaoka|Heileigh Gomes|Eri Sakai
title: Stupeur et tremblements
